ctx: intros f x v s nv.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros f x v s nv.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros f x v s nv. unfold nv. simpl. destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v) as [eq | neq]. - subst. reflexivity. - destruct (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm s)). + apply substituteFormulaForallNice. intros b q r. destruct (Nat.eq_dec x v) as [eq | neq]. * subst. contradiction. * destruct (in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm s)) as [yes | no]. ++ contradiction. ++ reflexivity. + reflexivity.
